original_title: Kaun Hai Jo Sapno Mein Aaya
overview: Kuldeep lives comfortably with his family.One day his friend asks him to look after his niece for a month. Mahek moves into the Khanna household and notices that the family is dysfunctional. She begins to reform the youngest one and succeeds.
title: Kaun Hai Jo Sapno Mein Aaya
